original_title: The American Folk Blues Festival 1962-1966, Vol. 1
overview: Taken from the European tours organised for American blues musicians between 1962 and 1969, this release features performances by several popular blues artists, including: T-Bone Walker, John Lee Hooker, Muddy Waters, etc.
tagline: A rare collection of performances by American's Premiere bluesman at the peak of their artistry
title: The American Folk Blues Festival 1962-1966, Vol. 1
